alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Murray, southern Whitfield, southeastern Walker and northwestern Gordon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Villanow, or 9 miles southwest of Dalton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Resaca, Mill Creek, Villanow, Tilton, and Nickelsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northwestern Georgia.
